import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save the white label logo text settings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/whitelabel/logotext/save"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the white label logo text specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"IsDark","in":"query","description":"Specifies if the white label logo is for the dark theme or not.","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}},{"name":"IsDefault","in":"query","description":"Specifies if the logo is for a default tenant or not.","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"logoText":{"maxLength":40,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The text to display alongside or in place of the logo.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"logo":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"value":{"type":"object","properties":{"light":{"type":"string","description":"The URL or base64-encoded image data for the light theme logo.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"dark":{"type":"string","description":"The URL or base64-encoded image data for the dark theme logo.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for the theme-specific logo configurations.","title":"LogoRequestsDto"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ItemKeyValuePairStringLogoRequestsDto"},"description":"The white label tenant IDs with their logos (light or dark).","nullable":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring the white label branding settings.","title":"WhiteLabelRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Boolean value: true if the operation is sucessful","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"boolean"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"BooleanWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"No permissions to perform this action"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
